name: kraken2

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Kraken2 is a system for assigning taxonomic labels to short DNA
sequences, usually obtained through metagenomic studies.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: rsync
dependencies.description: An open source utility that provides fast incremental file transfer.

dependencies.name: wget
dependencies.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.

dependent_to.name: bracken
dependent_to.description:
Bracken (Bayesian Reestimation of Abundance with KrakEN) is a highly
accurate statistical method that computes the abundance of species in
DNA sequences from a metagenomics sample.
